name: Push (itch) (ninjarunner)
description:
NOTE: For some reason when I exported the game It broke the text objects and I couldn't figure out how to fix it so just know if you are hit by an enemy and your screen turns grey you're dead and if your screen turns grey after collecting the coin on the fourth level you've won.

An Extremely Short Game Where You Push Around A Coin / Yellow Cube Thing 

Your goal is to collect it

It has 4 levels. Its nothing special I just wanted to finish a game which I rarely do. It was made in 2 - 3 ish hours. Hope you enjoy
